source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW leaveentitlement_dim_non_null

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    Staff_Number,
    number,
    deduction,
    ded_from,
    ded_to,
    absence_quota_type,
    expected_from

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_leave
WHERE Staff_Number IS NOT NULL AND absence_quota_type IS NOT NULL;

# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.leave_entitlement_dim)
- **New Data:** where a EmployeeID in the source does not exist as an EmployeeID in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on EmployeeID in source and ContracEmployeeIDtCode in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an EmployeeID in the target exists but the same workc doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View leave_entitlement_dim_new is created

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW leaveentitlement_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Staff_Number IS NULL
        THEN T3.LeaveEntitlementID
        ELSE NULL
    END as LeaveEntitlementID,     
    T1.Staff_Number AS EmployeeID, -- FK to employee_fact
    T1.number AS LeaveDaysPerYear,
    T1.deduction AS LeaveDeduction,
    to_timestamp(T1.ded_from) AS LeaveYearStart,
    to_timestamp(T1.ded_to) AS LeaveYearEnd,
    T1.absence_quota_type AS AbsenceQuotaType,
    date_add(T1.Expected_From, -1) AS ExpectedFrom,
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.Expected_From) AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.Staff_Number,'.'),IFNULL(T1.number,'.'),IFNULL(T1.deduction,'.'),IFNULL(cast(T1.ded_from as varchar(20)),'.'),IFNULL(T1.absence_quota_type,'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    T3.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM leaveentitlement_dim_non_null T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_leave_entitlement_dim T3 ON T1.Staff_Number = T3.EmployeeID AND 
                                                        T1.absence_quota_type = T3.AbsenceQuotaType AND
                                                        T3.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Staff_Number = T3.EmployeeID AND T1.absence_quota_type = T3.AbsenceQuotaType
            AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.Staff_Number,'.'),IFNULL(T1.number,'.'),IFNULL(T1.deduction,'.'),IFNULL(cast(T1.ded_from as varchar(20)),'.'),IFNULL(T1.absence_quota_type,'.'))) <> T3.RowID  -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.EmployeeID  IS NULL -- new employee
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y' 
AND T1.Staff_Number IS NOT NULL;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **leave_entitlement_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View contract_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW leaveentitlement_dim_changed_rows

    AS

Select 
    LeaveEntitlementID,
    EmployeeID,
    LeaveDaysPerYear,
    LeaveDeduction,
    LeaveYearStart,
    LeaveYearEnd,
    AbsenceQuotaType,
    ExpectedFrom,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From leaveentitlement_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

SELECT
    T1.LeaveEntitlementID,
    T1.EmployeeID,
    T1.LeaveDaysPerYear,
    T1.LeaveDeduction,
    T1.LeaveYearStart,
    T1.LeaveYearEnd,
    T1.AbsenceQuotaType,
    T1.ExpectedFrom,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_leave_entitlement_dim T1
INNER JOIN leaveentitlement_dim_new T2 ON   T1.EmployeeID = T2.EmployeeID AND
                                            T1.AbsenceQuotaType = T2.AbsenceQuotaType AND
                                            T2.LeaveEntitlementID IS NULL AND 
                                            T2.IsActive = 'Y'
;

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM leaveentitlement_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW leaveentitlement_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    T1.LeaveEntitlementID,
    T1.EmployeeID,
    T1.LeaveDaysPerYear,
    T1.LeaveDeduction,
    T1.LeaveYearStart,
    T1.LeaveYearEnd,
    T1.AbsenceQuotaType,
    T1.ExpectedFrom,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM leaveentitlement_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View leave_entitlement_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. workc from SAPHR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.leave_entitlement_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_leave_entitlement_dim AS Target
USING leaveentitlement_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.LeaveEntitlementID = Target.LeaveEntitlementID 

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (LeaveEntitlementID,
        EmployeeID,
        LeaveDaysPerYear,
        LeaveDeduction,
        LeaveYearStart,
        LeaveYearEnd,
        AbsenceQuotaType,
        ExpectedFrom,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.LeaveEntitlementID,
        Source.EmployeeID,
        Source.LeaveDaysPerYear,
        Source.LeaveDeduction,
        Source.LeaveYearStart,
        Source.LeaveYearEnd,
        Source.AbsenceQuotaType,
        Source.ExpectedFrom,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive);

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.leave_entitlement_dim is updated

%%sql

-- Insert new leaveentitlementID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_leave_entitlement_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY LeaveEntitlementID NULLS LAST) AS LeaveEntitlementID,
    EmployeeID,
    LeaveDaysPerYear,
    LeaveDeduction,
    LeaveYearStart,
    LeaveYearEnd,
    AbsenceQuotaType,
    ExpectedFrom,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_leave_entitlement_dim;
